pages.title: Kamen Rider Ark-Zero-One
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One: Final Stage (2020, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/hiden_zero_one_driver#hiden_zero_one_driver_azu)Hiden Zero-One Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed V$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Haste IV$(li)Jump Boost V$(li)Strength V
